achievements: Considered one of the greatest Russian writers of all time.
Known for his satirical and absurdist works such as 'Dead Souls' and 'The Nose'.
Prominent Bolshevik leader during the Russian Revolution.
Key figure in the development of Soviet economic policy.
One of the most influential Russian composers of the late 19th century.
Known for his orchestral works and operas, including 'Scheherazade' and 'The Golden Cockerel'.
